Question 48 
 
 
 
 
Measurement
 
(1M)
 
 
Inductance is measured by, 
 
(A) Schering bridge 
(B) Maxwell bridge  
(C) Kelvin bridge  
(D) Wien bridge 
Ans. 
B 
Sol. 
(i) Schering bridge is used for the measurement of capacitance. 
 
(ii) Wien bridge is used for the measurement of frequency.  
 
(iii) Kelvin bridge is used for the measurement of resistance.  
 
(iv) Maxwell bridge is used for the measurement of inductance.  
 
Hence, the correct option is (B).
